name: pasta
directions: cook pasta, add tomato and olive oil

name: chicken and rice
directions: cut chicken into pieces, cook in pot, add rice and chicken stock, simmer for 20 minutes

name: chicken and rice 2
directions: cut chicken and onion into pieces, cook in pot, add rice and chicken stock, simmer for 20 minutes

name: chili
ingredients: 1 carrot, 1 celery, 1 onion, 1 beef stock, 1 beef
directions: cut vegetables, put beef in pot, cook beef, cook vegetables, put in beef stock, simmer, serve

name: soup
ingredients: 1 carrot, 1 celery, 1 onion, 1 chicken stock, 1 chicken
directions: cut vegetables, put chicken in pot, cook chicken, shred chicken, cook vegetables, put in chicken stock, simmer, serve
